entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Marshalling structs containing bool fields #88956
    9.0.0
  • Consider replacing `Dictionary` with `ConcurrentDictionary` in `DefaultMeterFactory` #88955
  • ConcurrentDictionary.FirstOrDefault performance issue #88953
  • Support unboxing a true nullable and opt-in to faster emitted IL invoke stubs #88952
  • Invalid codegen with Unsafe.As on FullOpts when accessing a struct field through ulong->struct cast. #88950
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: A `Debugger` method that allows opening a file on a line in currently attached debugger #88949
  • [API Proposal]: Expose remaining AVX512-VBMI & AVX512-VBMI2 hardware instructions #88946
  • Building iOS in release mode still attaches `--debug` flag to Mono AOT compiler #88940
  • `Trace.Assert` does not indicate that a nullable refernece type is not null #88939
  • [Runtime] Jump stubs appear as `?!?` in ETL traces #88938

Closed

  • AccessViolationException or InvalidOperationException thrown in local method with .NET 8 preview 7 nightly #88842
    8.0.0
  • AccessViolationException using System.Numerics.Vector3 #79118
    8.0.0
  • Fill in gaps in shared runtime location logic (DOTNET_ROOT) #38462
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add invoker classes for fast invoke APIs #85539
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix SelectLocalIndirTransform to take offset into account #88951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect nativeaot event thread / sequence number on shutdown #88941
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix genPutArgStkFieldList for SIMD12 #88920
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add System.Net.NameResolution metrics #88773
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Add public MethodInvoker and ConstructorInvoker classes #88415
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] mono_exit improvements #88387
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Exclude unnecessary artifacts from the Native AOT sample app bundle #88931
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix use-out-of-scope in signature comparison #88928
    blocking, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Convert.Try{From/To}HexString #86556
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2222783 #88935
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][interp] Fix memory leaks for interpreted dynamic methods. #88892
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write/Copy, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mark final types as exact #88163
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SBLK_MASK_LOCK_THREADID allow tid up to 65535 #88772
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove createdump's DAC dependency for the PAL for NativeAOT #88802
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Get DataContractSerializer to behave nicely with unloadable AssemblyLoadContext #88791
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Fix GCDesc computation #88927
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][mt] Release all proxies of C# and JS objects on WebWorker #88052
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Allow download retry+throttling in unified code with blazor #88910
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Fix `TimeZoneInfo.Equals` and `TimeZoneInfo.HasSameRules` #88869
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Fix behavior of default interfaces interacting with constraints #88932
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Use live illink for trimming tests #88929
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Enable ExtendedProtectionPolicy in generic System.Net.Security build #88871
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • unroll byref struct copies #86820
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable tests and fix bugs #2307

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix array allocators #2342
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement exception dispatch info support #2341

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] GCDesc computation fix #2340

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • File used by another process #33956
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Downlevel wasm tests fail on net6.0.x runtime pack download #32864
    8.0.1xx
  • failed to find runtime pack #32205
  • .NET 8: Make `Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk` an implicit reference #25797

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2222520 #34037
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `ref` parameters on Primary constructors #69055
  • Slice pattern with type pattern generates redundant type test (or fails to perform the test intended) #69053
  • IDE0038 is not enforced during build #69052
  • Disallow extension methods lookup on non-static or generic types #69051
  • Cache extension methods for `PENamedTypeSymbol` #69050
  • Optimize `ArrayBuilder.ToDictionary` to use SmallDictionary when appropriate #69049
  • Favor `Kind` check over type checking when appropriate #69048

Closed

  • IDE0056 cannot be inverted / works only when preferring index-from-end operator #69054

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused `DiagnosticBag` local in `BuildArgumentsForErrorRecovery` #69047
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Cache RetargetingParameterSymbol.TypeWithAnnotations to avoid ~8.3% allocations in a trace #69011
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next

Updated

  • Collection literals: collection builder methods #68930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets - `svm` and `sim` snippets #68854
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce `TypeConversions`, bool arrays, and `HashSet<TypeWithAnnotations>` allocations #69040
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Update roslyn-analyzers to 8.0.0-preview.23364.2 #69043
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Compiler Breaking Changes documentation (VS2015 - VS2019) #69031
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Pc active statements #69028
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Wasm dotnet 8 preview 6 doesn't work on chrome android phone #49441
  • Quickgrid shows three loading dots with the loading placeholder #49440
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #49439
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #49438
  • IFormFileCollection minimal api behave different from mvc controller #49437
  • Loading multiple RCL projects (Module1, Module2) that share a common RCL (Common) project into a BlazorWasm client that also references this shared RCL (Common) #49435
  • Blazor 8: Blazor Web App router does not seem to see pages in an RCL #49432
  • Perf regression: mvc #49429

Closed

  • Claim-Based Authorization For Controller Actions #49431
  • Clarify intentions for dynamic preventDefault #48193
    Discussions
  • Page with "dictionary" route cannot be refreshed #49434
  • Perf improvement: json #49281

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve HttpContextAccessor debugging #49430
    area-runtime

Updated

  • [SignalR] Harden MessageBuffer #49423
    area-signalr
  • Adding QuickGridC component to QuickGrid library #49427
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Emit diagnostics for unsupported RDG scenarios #49417
    feature-rdg, area-minimal

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui Handlers using partial classes do always replace existing handlers? How to customize and existing control with Handlers? #16178
  • OnNavigatedTo not called on iOS on tabs placed in the "More" section of a TabbedPage #16175

Closed

  • Convert all uses of UICommand to UIAction #9332
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Android: Border offset from its region, and increases with DPI #15339

PullRequests

Created

  • Android Ecosystem 20230714 net8.0 nuget bumps fix issue 16074 type renaming #16177
  • Android Ecosystem 20230714 net7.0 nuget bumps fix issue 16074 type renaming #16176

Merged

  • Map all menu items through a single selector #16174
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-menubar

Updated

  • Windows (packaged) Device tests for CI #15629
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/testing
  • Prevent Android timer from adding multiple callbacks #16078
  • Stop DispatcherTimer after Tick fires if IsRepeating is false #16173
  • Prevent refresh command from executing when CanExecute is false #16090
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16033
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: SelectExpression.Update always creates new instance of SelectExpression without checking if anything changed #31276
  • Configure nested types as complex types by default #31275
  • Conditional detection of dotnet ef migrations add command in .csproj #31273
  • Breaking behavior of LoadAsync() in EF 8 preview #31271

PullRequests

Created

  • Add infrastructure for trimming and NativeAOT test apps. #31274
  • Part of JSON primitive collection serialization #31272

Updated

  • Feature/translate json functions #29306 #30010
    waiting-for-response
  • Fix to #30922 - Most cases of projecting a primitive collection don't work #31263
  • Target .NET 8 #31270
